price: 69. Ceux qui luttent pour Notre cause, Nous les conduirons vers Nos chemins. Allah est certes avec les bienfaiteurs.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَٰهَدُواْ فِينَا لَنَهۡدِيَنَّهُمۡ سُبُلَنَاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمَعَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna jāhadū fīnā lanahdiyannahum subulanā wa-inna al-laha lamaʿa al-muḥ'sinīna
